channel.title: Anyone want to try to fix?

item.title: Anyone want to try to fix?
item.dc:creator: @Broc923 Broc923
item.description:
@Broc923 wrote:

This is a reletivly simple code. My objective is to type ::freeze and make a player be unable to move. I’m not for sure what to do. I had a different code contacting by client that didnt error but it DC’d you on type. SOO any help here: heres my code…

if (command.startsWith(“freeze”)
&& playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Broc923”)) {
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
		if (!IsInFightCave() && !p.IsInFightCave()) {
                    p.EntangleDelay = 200000000;
                    p.sM(
                            "You have been frozen. You can't move till unfrozen by staff.");
		}
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to freeze..");
            }
        }

if (command.startsWith(“unfreeze”)
&& playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Broc923”)) {
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
		if (!IsInFightCave() && !p.IsInFightCave()) {
                    p.EntangleDelay = 1;
                    p.sM(
                            "You have been unfrozen.");
		}
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to unfreeze...");
            }
        }

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone want to try to fix?
